resources.string:
Rules:
 1. Movie name length is not more than 20 words incl spaces.
 2. write in either uppercase or all lowercase letters.
 3. For Space, add "/" after each word.
Sholay,Mughal-e-Azam,Mother India,Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenee,Pyaasa,Guide,Deewaar,Lagaan,Pakeezah,Amar Akbar Anthony
